site_name: Land At Estate Way, And Gateway Business Centre, Church Road, E10
description: A comprehensive phased development comprising the demolition of all existing buildings and structures and the erection of building blocks to provide a mixed use scheme that would accommodate 496 residential units (Use Class C3), 15,029 sqm of mixed use Class E (g - office/light industrial processes) and B8 (storage and distribution) together with 166 sqm of Class E (a, b, and c) for retail floor space. The development would comprise thirteen buildings that would range between two and twelve storeys around new public realm with pedestrian, car and cycle routes with landscaping, play space, car and cycle parking and servicing arrangements.
